mapper.insert: insert into Emails(sender_id, receiver_id, subject, content, status) values(#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{status})
mapper.select: select a.id id, a.sender_id senderId, a.receiver_id receiverId, a.subject subject, a.content content, a.send_time sendTime, a.is_read IsRead, a.status status, b.username receiverUsername, c.username senderUsername from Emails a, Users b, Users c where a.id = #{id} and a.receiver_id = b.id and a.sender_id = c.id

select a.id id, sender_id senderId, receiver_id receiverId, subject, content, send_time sendTime, username receiverUsername from Emails a, Users b where sender_id = #{senderId} and status = #{status} and receiver_id = b.id order by send_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE Emails SET receiver_id = #{receiverId}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, send_time = #{sendTime}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id id, a.sender_id senderId, a.receiver_id receiverId, a.subject subject, a.content content, a.send_time sendTime, a.is_read isRead, a.status status, b.username senderUsername from Emails a, Users b where a.sender_id = b.id and a.receiver_id = #{receiverId} and a.status = 'sent' order by send_time desc;
